title: Influence of Enlight. on elite and pop culture

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.Describe and analyze the influence of the Enlightenment on both elite culture and popular culture in the eighteenth century.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
